articles.title: Judge rules Colorado student cannot wear a sash with Mexican and American flags during graduation - CNN

articles.title: Colorectal cancer spike in young people could be caused by fungus - New York Post
articles.description: Researchers have found a possible reason as to why rates of colorectal cancer cases have spiked among patients under 50.
articles.content:
